long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Navigate your Reddit feed with the Keyboard!

The keys are mapped as followed:

w......Scroll to previous post
s.......Scroll to next post
a.......Show previous image in gallery
d.......Show next image in gallery
e.......Open post in new tab
x.......Downvote post
c.......Upvote post
